handball.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a game in which two teams try to score points by throwing or hitting a ball with their hands
handball.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a game in which players hit a ball against a wall with their hand
handball.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a ball that is used to play handball
handball.translation[0].definitions[3].d: the act of touching the ball with your hands in a game of football, which is not allowed
handball.translation[0].definitions[3].e: The referee gave a free kick for handball.
